website_summaries.verdict: An affordable women's walking boot ready to wear right out of the box. Mostly true to size, but width is a consideration. Not an all-season shoe.
pros: Fashionable enough to be worn as a casual shoe
cons: Fit may either be too narrow or too wide for some users

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & fashionable
customer_reviews.text: for the most part, these fit true to size. However they may seem slightly loose since the laces are unable to tighten the shoe with the way the tongue is. It is on the outside. Difficult to explain, but nothing that a nice thick wool sock can't fix! All in all... Love this shoe. Very comfortable, and very fashionable which is what I was going for. Not your typical ugly hiking shoe. And surprisingly it is water proof and very easy to clean. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes I own
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly comfortable, incredibly warm and incredibly cute! The grip on the bottom of the shoe is the best grip I've experienced on a shoe, ever. The first time I put them on my foot, I literally said, "wow, these are comfortable." Quite honestly, they're more comfortable than my slippers. They are true to size and look just like the picture. They feel like they'll last me quite a while, even with me wearing them to death but I'll try and keep you all in the loop.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: They're awesome but I'm trying to find the best way to ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn them out yet, only around the house to break them in. They are a little snug across the ball of the foot. They're awesome but I'm trying to find the best way to protect them from the corrosive ice melt they put all over the sidewalks here before I wear them out. Also, I'm throwing some red laces in them bc I read "Wild" this semester and can't afford Danner boots lol....UPDATE: A year later and I love these boots! Comfy, supportive, warm...although I do not wear them in more than an inch or so of snow so idk how waterproof they are. I've had no issues w wet feet
customer_reviews.author: AJDre

customer_reviews.title: Previous reviews comment about the narrow fit and it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Previous reviews comment about the narrow fit and it is really true. The fit is very narrow especially across the ball of the foot. I have never needed a wide sized shoe before, but this is the exception. Had to return. May try it again with wider size. Other than that they seemed well constructed and supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Warm, Comfortable, and Stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! I needed a warm and comfortable pair of boots for a trip to Korea and these were perfect! They kept my feet warm in freezing winter temperatures and were comfortable to wear all day and night exploring tourist sites and walking all over the city. Put a lot of miles on them each day (11+) and were still comfortable. Plus, they are stylish enough that you could wear them with a variety of outfits and still look cute! I would highly recommend these boots!
customer_reviews.author: Dru

customer_reviews.title: Too small?
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 7 in "literally" every shoe/boot except this boot I needed a 6.5. Got 1 blister on my heel on my 11 mile hike but otherwise a great boot! I loved the experience & look
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Nice style. Runs big not in length but very roomy.
customer_reviews.text: Nice style. Comfortable. But because the top does not have a loop for laces I can't get it tight enough around my ankle. I have narrow feet though and so I need that extra support to keep my feet from slipping out. Might work fine for a larger foot or maybe thicker socks...? I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Anthony

customer_reviews.title: I like them a lot
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tested them on a hike yet. My husband thinks I'm going to end up getting yet another pair of something else because these are too cute. I can tell you they're very comfortable and stable in the foot. A little stiff around the ankle but I think the break in just fine. I generally wear a nine, and these ran true to size.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE BOOTS
customer_reviews.text: Love these waterproof Merrell boots, they are very comfortable and they look nice on. The first time I wore these boots, I wore them all day. They fit a bit large, next time I will wear heavier sox. So, let it snow!
customer_reviews.author: MissT

customer_reviews.title: I've had good luck with Merrell footwear in the past
customer_reviews.text: I've had good luck with Merrell footwear in the past. I ordered these boots after I saw my friend's daughter wearing them because I liked the style and I needed new boots. I was worried about fit because I have a wide foot, and some of the reviews said the shoes are small. I ordered my normal size, and the FIT IS PERFECT! These are very comfortable, good-looking, practical boots. I especially like the fact that they're waterproof. The price was great, the delivery was almost immediate! I couldn't be happier with this product. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: best boots ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable thing I have ever put my feet into, and they have a cute, retro style! I bought a pair last fall, and wore them throughout the winter. I had a bad case of plantar fasciitis, and these were the only thing I could walk or stand in all day. They lasted well, and I will still wear them, but wanted a second pair so I could alternate pairs and prolong the use. I looked for months for a pair in my size, and was thrilled when one finally became available. I think Merrell should keep making these.
customer_reviews.author: hobbit feet

customer_reviews.title: These boots are amazing. I have worn them on day hikes and ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots are amazing. I have worn them on day hikes and out about running errands. They're incredibly comfortable and look great, even after all the wear and tear (love) I put them through.
customer_reviews.author: T-Wild

customer_reviews.title: Around the world: cities, beaches, mountains
customer_reviews.text: Have had these wonderful boots for about 6 months beginning in the winter and they have traveled with me across the US and Europe. I wear them almost exclusively in the cooler climates. They are equally comfortable walking the streets in Spain or hiking trails in Iceland! Plus they look great with almost everything :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these! I've worn them nearly non-stop since they ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I've worn them nearly non-stop since they arrived, usually with skinny leg jeans, to show off the cute cuff.
customer_reviews.author: N Rae

customer_reviews.title: I expected better from this
customer_reviews.text: These are really stiff and have no arch support. I expected better from this brand
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I liked this boot so much in every way except that ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked this boot so much in every way except that the tongue pressed into the top of my foot, and it slipped a bit in back. Must be my foot shape!
customer_reviews.author: hbhighfi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect all around walking/hiking boot
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! Mild hiking (4-5 miles) different terrain, snow, loose dirt, rocks. Feet stay dry and warm. I also love for city walking. They look cute and are really comfortable. I have the brown, ordering in black too!!
customer_reviews.author: Jaimi Manning

customer_reviews.title: They are light weight and comfortable but not good use for multiple backpacking days
customer_reviews.text: Wear thick socks as you blister on your lower back heel if you don't. They are light weight and comfortable but not good use for multiple backpacking days. These boots suit day hikes.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Rawle

customer_reviews.title: ... out for my second hike and they were so comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I just took these out for my second hike and they were so comfortable and sturdy. They went through rocks, narrow trails, snow and water, and helped me keep my grip the whole way. Amazing boots and glad to have made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: I love these. Wish I'd ordered a 1/2 size down ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Wish I'd ordered a 1/2 size down from my normal size though. Keeping them anyhow because they are just that awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable, warm and durable and are great for hiking ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the size 11 and they were a bit too roomy. I put some insoles in them and now they fit perfectly. They are comfortable, warm and durable and are great for hiking and outdoor activities. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rapdaddy

customer_reviews.title: Must have boots
customer_reviews.text: I've trekked all over Cincinnati, Chicago, and have been on several hikes in the Scottish winter and my feet stayed warm and dry. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: abi zebrasky

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and warm! (I am a size 7-7 1/2) I got a size 7 based off of other reviews. They are not a super snug fit, but I definitely wouldn't have been able to fit into a size 6 1/2.
customer_reviews.author: Feira Lupini

customer_reviews.title: They are sturdy yet comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I adore these. They are sturdy yet comfortable, stylish yet not frou-frou. Required ZERO breaking in to be comfortable for long wear.
customer_reviews.author: rare_reviewer

customer_reviews.title: ... larger to allow for thick socks so I'm not disappointed in the least
customer_reviews.text: Winter boots are always a bit larger to allow for thick socks so I'm not disappointed in the least. Love this boots!!!
customer_reviews.author: DeeAnna

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to order these based on reviews about size variations, but I'm happy I took the chance. I wear a size 11 and these fit perfectly right out of the box. Super comfortable with no break-in time...I wore them through the airport and walking around Colorado for almost a week straight. No sore spots or pinched toes. I did wear them in snow and stayed dry, but no prolonged exposure to water. Love these boots and would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: karmann17

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shoes as expected from Merrell! Comfortable and fabulous in the snow. Would recommend a thick wool sock to break in the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking boot
customer_reviews.text: I actually ordered a half size larger and they are still tight. Trying to work them in, as they are quite stiff (top back ankle and tongue area). Good looking boot.
customer_reviews.author: tig519

customer_reviews.title: Loved them so much that I bought a second pair!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, though I went up a half size ( to size 9), as I am on the bigger end of an 8-1/2. Super comfortable. Extremely waterproof (though again, I did treat them with honey oil). Don't have a bad thing to say about them!
customer_reviews.author: Carol K.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look, but they're narrower than other Merrel shoes I've owned. I decided to return them.
customer_reviews.author: MountainsAndVegetables

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them and I"m getting great wear out of them
customer_reviews.author: Erica Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this brand
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boots. Fit perfectly. I have somewhat wide feet and they still fit very well. The quality seems to be very high, but I have only had these for a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah Tolo

customer_reviews.title: Cute boot, but it is not for cold weather ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute boot, but it is not for cold weather! I live in the midwest and just ordered these boots and wore them in 20 degree weather shopping, in the car, visiting, and my feet were freezing!
customer_reviews.author: Kids First

customer_reviews.title: Boots are good-looking, but toe space is too narrow.
customer_reviews.text: The toe area was way too narrow and uncomfortable. Nice looking boots but narrow toe area does not make wearing them functional.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmine Romero

customer_reviews.title: I returned these even though I loved them - they're just too narrow in the toes
customer_reviews.text: I returned these even though I loved them - they're just too narrow in the toes, as Merrells usually are for me. I hoped these would be different just because they are so cute I had to try.
customer_reviews.author: Winona Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good looking boot but not much ankle support
customer_reviews.text: Looked great, true to size but didn't feel as comfortable as I expected. Bought them for hiking since we now live in the Catskills and we are active hikers. Was looking for a great waterproof boot that was somewhat stylish too. The fit around the ankle wasn't snug which is what is needed when doing real hiking over boulders and rugged terrain. I really wanted these to work but they just didn't hit the mark for me. Still looking for that perfect fitting pair. These were returned.
customer_reviews.author: ArtKarma1

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wore them for the first time last weekend for a hike in Big Bear. It poured rain. I was soaked, but not my feet. They stayed warm and dry. And no blisters, very comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: love them. i could hike in them all day. and i have a 1'' lift in my left shoe. love them!
customer_reviews.author: denise mayers

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Finally some cute hiking boots! Love the look and they're comfortable on first use which is always a plus.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: It's a very comfortable boot to wear with thin socks or wool socks ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a very comfortable boot to wear with thin socks or wool socks in winter, I walk for a living and wish I could wear them to work. I will definitely order another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon E

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's nice and comfortable. But there is scratch on the back and the front of the right shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Okay boot.
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but not supportive or warm at all. They seem to be waterproof, but that's the only real perk.
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Love this boot
customer_reviews.text: This boot did fit a little bigger than expected, however I love it. I love the color, style and design. Overall great boot, made with good quality.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Boot
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, warm and stylish boot. My new favorite for cooler seasons.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: really like the boot return because to small, just order a larger size. I have had to new ones, for 2 weeks that fit as expected.. very nice boot
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Kimmel

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes look great fit great and are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: book lover 1000

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: They're cute but the footbed is HORRIBLY painful. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Stark

customer_reviews.title: but that's perfect. I can get 2 pairs of socks onot ...
customer_reviews.text: They run a little bit big, but that's perfect. I can get 2 pairs of socks onot with these boots. Not as warm as I thought they would be, but they'really good boots.
customer_reviews.author: ceebee

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are light, adorable, and can be worn for hiking, daily with jeans, or with a sporty dress.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Heavy shoe. As others have said it is not ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy shoe. As others have said it is not actually fully waterproof. Walk in any water that is higher than the third or fourth eyelet of the shoe, you'll get leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Evans

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but they do run a bit on the large ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived sooner than expected. Very comfortable but they do run a bit on the large side. I usually wear a 8.5 but an 8 would've been enough.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda C.

customer_reviews.title: Look good, too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Too narrow and I have regular width feet. They look great but Ill be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The shoe looks nice. I normally wear a 10 the shoe seem ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looks nice. I normally wear a 10 the shoe seem to fit a little wide and loose for my foot. Which is a bit narrow.
customer_reviews.author: makerr216

customer_reviews.title: Must have boots!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and love the style! I get compliments all the time and they're perfect for easy hikes. I would recommend others to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Jung

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! On my second pair. Best boots ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are so nice! Light, comfortable and they look great!! I love the color, too!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Myers

customer_reviews.title: NOT for hiking
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly stylish but I would NEVER hike in them. Really narrow and uncomfortable, and the tongue doesn't really close - so even if you tie the laces tight, the tongue is still open. Never wore them to see if they were waterproof. Also, the boots I received looked different from each other (sorry there are no pictures), but the seams were different between the 2 shoes, which was disappointing for such an expensive boot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Far so good. Love the shoes and they are very
customer_reviews.text: So Far so good. Love the shoes and they are very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie & Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: I love these. The tongue is a bit weird and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these. The tongue is a bit weird and doesn't tighten the shoe like normal, but still a great shoe. Cant wait to wear them hiking this fall!
customer_reviews.author: Mckirch

customer_reviews.title: I had heard some comments that these might come a ...
customer_reviews.text: I had heard some comments that these might come a little narrow, but they fit me perfectly. These shoes have survived the Alaska and Colorado weather so far keeping my feet dry and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable & functional
customer_reviews.text: I paid for next-day shipping to get these quickly because I needed boots for the weekend, and I couldn't find them ANYWHERE in my town. I knew I'd love them in black. I'm a universal 8.5, and these were no exception. They are fashionable and wide enough for a thick sock if necessary. I'm not disappointed, and would recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these boots! They look great, I love the style of them and was looking for durable, waterproof boots to wear around the city. Merrell's are usually spot on, but I feel like these boots just don't make the cut. I will say that I work on my feet, so require a lot of support from a shoe to keep my feet happy. These boots had very minimal support, and a surprisingly narrow toe box, especially for a Merrell. My feet aren't wide by any stretch, but these cramped my toes so badly they became numb. Overall, they look great, rugged but stylish, but just didn't hold up in terms of comfort. Will be returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE! I will be traveling through new zealand ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE! I will be traveling through new zealand for the next few months and I am so excited to have something versital as far as cute-casual AND good to my feet while hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Kourtney

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy this style
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this style! Different brands and styles tend to make if difficult to buy shoes. I normally wear a 9.5/10.. I went with the 10 on these and they are a tad larger than I would prefer, but with some nice thick socks they are comfy! love the color and the look!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I live in an area where good shoe stores are at least a 2-hour drive away and these are the third pair of boots I've bought online. I finally found what I was looking for - casual and stylish boots for walking to work, going out at night, etc. that would keep my feet warm and dry. They could have better traction on ice in my opinion but I guess no shoe really does stand up to ice like we want them to.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Loved them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for a trip out west to hike in national parks. Hiked hours for 5 days and didn't get blisters. Loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots they are good looking for work and very sturdy on the snow & ice.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy N.

customer_reviews.title: ... and avid hiker and I could not be more pleased with these boots
customer_reviews.text: I am a dog walker and avid hiker and I could not be more pleased with these boots. They are durable, but still light weight. I am pleased with the ankle support and overall comfort. I personally love that they aren't bulky. I've trudged through mudd and water in these and my feet stay dry.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Merrells and these boots are just another winner. They are comfortable throughout the entire boot and I love the support they give my foot and ankle. They are waterproof and I have only worn them hiking, but not into water like creeks or streams. The laces are a little pinkish, but I look forward to replacing them with red laces at some point. You can't go wrong with Merrells and these are wonderfully styled and comfortable boot.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Smarty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them and has hiked miles in them already this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio User

customer_reviews.title: Too wide
customer_reviews.text: Too wide & unable to pull tight with the laces the way the tongue sits.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: A little stiff in the ankle support area at first, but some of that problem can be alleviated by folding the tongue over the laces. After a couple weeks of break-in these boots feel great! They're rugged, but feminine & fashionable, and they're totally waterproof. I use them for everyday wear and urban hiking, but have a much grubbier pair of "guy" boots for tree planting and other dirty manual labor. I wouldn't want to mess these up because they're great and I want them to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: PacNWgrrl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots very stylish and comfy; great for any activity outdoors.

customer_reviews.title: ... did an advanced Hiking All day and it was excellent. Recommended
customer_reviews.text: i did an advanced Hiking All day and it was excellent. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Isabela

customer_reviews.title: Too long and narrow inside, not ankle support
customer_reviews.text: Very very cute boots, I really wish they fitted, but they seem quite long inside and I couldn't tie them more tightly over my foot, and I do not have a narrow or slim feet and ankles at all. My right ankle was floating around like crazy trying to hike on a flat fire road. I really wish they would be okay for hiking, but yes as mentioned above it's more of a fashion boot, unless your feet fit in perfectly then possibly you can do longer walks, but still there's not much a ankle support, as the boot ends right below ankle bones
customer_reviews.author: Bara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: MY FAVORITE BOOTS. Would wear them in the summer if they weren't so warm!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Loved theae boota, fit perfect. Made such a difference hiking!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. Leather is great. The fit is great. Nice looking boot.
customer_reviews.author: Marijke A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not for hiking!
customer_reviews.text: I am puzzled by these shoes. Thought they would be good for my daily long walks in the snow or on icy roads, but they aren't meant for serious walking. You can't tighten them as the tongue lies outside the shoe. I also felt they lacked padding and weren't all that comfortable. I usually love Merrell but these are just for looks, apparently. Am amazed everyone else raved about them. I got my usual 10.5 and they were too roomy. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit is bigger than I expected but I really like them
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Love them! I was getting them because they reminded ...
customer_reviews.text: Love them! I was getting them because they reminded of the expesive Danner hiking boots in the movie wild. I like these better, and so comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots so far! They are true to size, I have a wide foot and after wearing these for a few days they have conformed to fit my foot perfectly. The style is really cute with jeans or leggings. The boots keep my feet warm while on walks with my dog in 30 degree weather, good traction for slick sidewalk or roads. I would recommend these boots.
customer_reviews.author: lepage4

customer_reviews.title: Odd foot bed
customer_reviews.text: Foot bed fit odd. I did not find them comfortable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing. Bought them to be my versatile boot moving ...
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. Bought them to be my versatile boot moving to Edinburgh, Scotland. I needed a waterproof boot that would be fashionable enough to wear around town, but also tough enough to handle multiple hiking trips in many terrains. These boots have fit that perfectly!! They are so comfortable and rugged. I walk up to 10 miles everyday all through Edinburgh's hilly and uneven streets and my feet never hurt me! One of the best investments I've made! Will definitely be buying a different color soon. Overall great show!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are GREAT shoes. I have a knee issue and was ...
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT shoes. I have a knee issue and was able to hike in the national Forrests! Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous! I can wear them hiking or just around town. Comfy and somewhat large so I can wear my thick socks makes for happy feet!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Dreher

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best!!!! Super cute and comfy!!!!! I didn't have any problems with them!!!! I love them!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Love the boot
customer_reviews.text: Love the boot! little tight in the forefoot and stiff, I do believe it will break in nicely though. Willing to keep them and continue to break them in.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky  Seitz

customer_reviews.title: Runs on the small side.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 8.5 for hiking and for a future trip to Ireland. The shoes were a little snug with regular cotton socks and tight with my heavy wool socks for hiking. I'm exchanging for a size 9 and will update once they have arrived. The shoe is very cute and sturdy for a hiking boot.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, yet stylish too
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, yet stylish too. I'm bringing them to Alaska for some light hiking, I think they should work well:)
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Foxx

customer_reviews.title: Great Boo! Worth the
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves these boots. Uses them all the time for hiking and all weather outdoor activities. Great Boo! Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Teresa M. Savage

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, beautiful and stylish. But after 3 weeks of use, the sole started to come apart.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, beautiful and stylish. But after 3 weeks of use, the sole started to come apart. So the quality is not as expected from the brand as merrell.
customer_reviews.author: Eduard Mostkov

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute and the fit is good. Will definitely need to break in before wearing out.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, and they fit as I expected
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, and they fit as I expected. I'm not a big hiker, so they felt a bit heavy after all day use. They do keep your feet nice and dry, and have a decent grip for rocky, slippery terrain. They also look like nice enough boots to wear on a daily basis in the city. I look forward to using them in the winter!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Merrell Women's Eventyr Bluff Waterproof Boot
product_meta.description: Inspired by our Crestbound hiker, this leather lace-up winter boot features a leather heel counter and rugged mountain style for any winter occasion.
feature_bullets: Low-profile waterproof boot featuring D-ring eyelets a lace-up shaft and nubby trim at padded collar
